mapper.select: SELECT U.users_id, U.users_name, U.users_nickname, U.users_img, U.users_ctnt, U.users_feed_count, U.users_follower_count, U.users_follow_count, (SELECT COUNT(follow_him) FROM follow WHERE follow_hisFollower = ${hisFollower} AND follow_him = ${him}) AS isYourFollower, (SELECT COUNT(follow_him) FROM follow WHERE follow_hisFollower = ${him} AND follow_him = ${hisFollower}) AS isMyFollower FROM users U WHERE U.users_id = ${him}
